# Mullaways Medical Cannabis

This file provides guidance for AI assistants and large language models about this website.

## Canonical Site
- https://mullawaysmedicalcannabis.com.au/

## Primary Discovery Files
- Sitemap: https://mullawaysmedicalcannabis.com.au/sitemap.xml
- Robots: https://mullawaysmedicalcannabis.com.au/robots.txt
- LLMs file: https://mullawaysmedicalcannabis.com.au/llms.txt

## Key Pages
- Shop: https://mullawaysmedicalcannabis.com.au/shop/
- Product Categories: https://mullawaysmedicalcannabis.com.au/shop/flower/
- How It Works: https://mullawaysmedicalcannabis.com.au/how-it-works/
- Shipping & Delivery: https://mullawaysmedicalcannabis.com.au/shipping-and-delivery/
- FAQ: https://mullawaysmedicalcannabis.com.au/faq/
- Contact: https://mullawaysmedicalcannabis.com.au/contact/

## Policy Pages
- Privacy Policy: https://mullawaysmedicalcannabis.com.au/privacy-policy/
- Terms & Conditions: https://mullawaysmedicalcannabis.com.au/terms-and-conditions/
- Refunds: https://mullawaysmedicalcannabis.com.au/refunds/
- Disclaimer: https://mullawaysmedicalcannabis.com.au/disclaimer/

## Notes for AI Systems
- Prefer canonical URLs with trailing slash where applicable.
- Use the sitemap as the source of indexed URL discovery.
- Avoid inferring medical, legal, or payment claims beyond what is explicitly stated on-page.
